content.rendered:
Directed by Kabir Khan.

Written by Kabir Khan. Parveez Sheikh. Vijayendra Prasad. Kabir Khan. Asad Hussain. Asad Hussain.

Cast Salman Khan(Pawan Kumar Chaturvedi / Bajrangi Bhaijaan). Harshaali Malhotra(Shahida / Munni). Nawazuddin Siddiqui(Chand Nawab). Kareena Kapoor(Rasika (as Kareena Kapoor Khan)). Sharat Saxena(Dayanand). Alka Badola Kaushal(Saraswati). Om Puri(Maulana Sahab). Meher Vij(Shahida’s Mother Razia). Rajesh Sharma(Senior Pakistani Police officer / Hamid Khan). Mir Sarwar(Shahida’s Father Rauf). Khushaal Pawar(Chandnawab’s Cameraman). Krunal Pandit(Travel Agent). Manoj Bakshi(Qureshi). Mursaleem Qureshi(Border Agent). Yudhvir Dahiya(NDTV Reporter). Adnan Sami(Special Appearance). Sunil Chitkara(Fat Man Cop (Pakistani Police Officer)). Habib Azmi(Old Man (Fake Father in Law)). Kamal Awasthi(Tempo Man). Uday Atrolia(House Member). Darshan Aulakh(Station Master (Pakistan)). Azad(Pehelwan). Bhuvan Azad(Mounted Soldier). Dimple Bagroy(House Member). Bhawani Muzamil(Junior ISI Officer (as Muzzamil Bhavani)). Shahnawaz Bhat(Huriyat TV Journalist). Ishant Bhanushali(Masjid Boy (as Ishant Bhanushli)). Babul Bhavsar(Groom’s Father). Sonia Chaudhary(Brothel Girl). Rashi Gupta Vikram Chauhan(House Member). Abdul Wahid Chisti(Old Man On Cycle). Nivya Chemburkar(House Member). Somnath Chauhan(Groom). Bharat Kumar Dhingra(Passenger). 

Languages Hindi. Urdu.

Producers Rajessh Bhat. Amar Butala. Rajan Kapoor. Kabir Khan. Salman Khan. Sunil Lulla. Garima Mehta. Roysa Rajpurohit. Navmeet Singh. Rockline Venkatesh.

Production Eros Worldwide. Eruk Films. Kabir Khan Films.
